page.title: 03MY HOLIDAY IN GREAT YARMOUTH
page.content:
By Christopher Ingram. Age 10.
When we go on holiday we stay in a caravan by the sea.I enjoy it because there's so much to do.Early every morn- ing I get my bike out and go for a ride After breakfast we go to the beach and dad and I play cricket.When I get hot I buy an ice-cream to cool me down,or I paddle in the sea.We go back to the caravan for lunch and we have cold drinks.In the afternoon there are fairs to go to,and I can even go fishing.
In the evening we have a barbecue which I enjoy because I am very hungry.If the weather is bad,I get my toy soldiers out and play with them.When the two weeks are over,we go home to Irchester and wait for the next holiday.
